MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK7 postcode area of Sauchieburn. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:37pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulties on our overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:36pm on Saturday 26th December 2020
